thread.title: Bride gives pastor father ‘certificate of purity’ at wedding
thread.title_full: Bride gives pastor father ‘certificate of purity’ at wedding - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Bride gives pastor father ‘certificate of purity’ at wedding
text:
WTTG Brelyn Bowman (l.) presented her pastor with a doctor-endorsed purity certificate proving she was a virgin when she married Timothy Bowman (r.). A Maryland preacher’s daughter was a virgin when she got married and she has the doctor-endorsed purity certificate to prove it.
Brelyn Bowman presented her father, Pastor Mike Freeman, with a “certificate of purity” at her lavish wedding earlier this month. The diploma-sized document was signed by her doctor and certified that her hymen was intact.
“This was my way to honor him,” the bride said on Good Day DC. “He was so excited because it's not nothing he required. He didn't ask.”
